title: How Art World Improvisation Can Work in the C-Suite
itunes:title: How Art World Improvisation Can Work in the C-Suite
description:
Maria Brito, Art Advisor and Curator, discusses her book How Creativity Rules The World: The Art and Business of Turning Your Ideas Into Gold.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
